page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: I am a member of Ellesmere Girl Guides who are the older Brownies. It was founded 75 years ago by Olive Baden-Powell, wife of Baden-Powell who founded the Scouts and Cubs. You have to be 10 years old before you can join. Our meetings start at 7pm. and end ar 8.30pm. You pay 20p. subscription every week; that money goes towards badges, going camping and things like that. Then, if you want a drink or a biscuit you pay an extra 5p. A guide uniform is a blue blouse with skirt and a yellow triangular tie with a red band all round it. At Guides, we cook meals outside, play games and we go camping.
